channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15846] Relocate more dependencies (e.g. org.apache.zookeeper) for JDBC uber jar
item.summary: Relocate more dependencies (e.g. org.apache.zookeeper) for JDBC uber jar

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
The size of the JDBC uber jar has been reduced from ~ 68MB to ~ 63MB with this change.

cc thejas

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12851759/HIVE-15846.1.patch

taoli-hwx
Can you please verify it works with this change with following configs enabled as well ? - zookeeper, kerberos and http mode ?
thejas I have verified it works in a Kerberized cluster with ZK.
